mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT c.post_id , c.cmt_id , c.writer_id , p.post_writer_id , c.cmt_date , c.cmt_content , c.secret , c.deleted , c.blocked , c.cmt_like_count , l.like_check FROM comments c, likes l, post p WHERE p.post_id = c.post_id AND c.cmt_id = l.ref_id(+) AND l.like_user_id(+) = #{userId} AND c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.cmt_date DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN (#{search.currentPage}-1)*#{search.pageSize}+1 AND #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize}
